layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x34
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x34
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {address} at (0,0) size 784x18 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 352x18
          text run at (0,0) width 352: "This address element should have a green background."
